account.description: The account name. If the account is a channel, the channel_id. The 'net' entry is the rollup of all channel accounts

lease_fee_paid_msat.description: Sats paid for leasing inbound (liquidity ads)

lease_fee_earned_msat.description: Sats earned for leasing outbound (liquidity ads)

pushed_out_msat.description: Sats pushed to peer at open

pushed_in_msat.description: Sats pushed in from peer at open

our_start_balance_msat.description: Starting balance in channel at funding. Note that if our start balance is zero, any _initial field will be omitted (can't divide by zero)

utilization_out.description: Sats routed outbound / total start balance

utilization_out_initial.description: Sats routed outbound / our start balance

utilization_in.description: Sats routed inbound / total start balance

utilization_in_initial.description: Sats routed inbound / our start balance

apy_out.description: Fees earned on outbound routed payments / total start balance for the length of time this channel has been open amortized to a year (APY)

apy_out_initial.description: Fees earned on outbound routed payments / our start balance for the length of time this channel has been open amortized to a year (APY)

apy_in.description: Fees earned on inbound routed payments / total start balance for the length of time this channel has been open amortized to a year (APY)

apy_in_initial.description: Fees earned on inbound routed payments / our start balance for the length of time this channel has been open amortized to a year (APY)

apy_total.description: Total fees earned on routed payments / total start balance for the length of time this channel has been open amortized to a year (APY)

apy_total_initial.description: Total fees earned on routed payments / our start balance for the length of time this channel has been open amortized to a year (APY)

apy_lease.description: Lease fees earned over total amount leased for the lease term, amortized to a year (APY). Only appears if channel was leased out by us
